derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English: from Old French chevalerie, from medieval Latin caballerius, for late Latin caballarius 'horseman' (see chevalier)

entry.tran: 骑士风度;(尤指对女子的)彬彬有礼，殷勤
entry.def: Chivalry is polite, kind, and unselfish behaviour, especially by men towards women.

entry.tran: （中世纪的）骑士精神，骑士风范
entry.def: In the Middle Ages, chivalry was the set of rules and way of behaving which knights were expected to follow.
